text: so we are outside guru RAM Raheem's
huge temple complex it's just on the
other side of that wall you see it to my
left here in fact we're just driving
past the main entrance to the complex
now obviously we'd like to get inside a
number of journalists and television
crews have tried to get in a couple of
them were attacked and really quite
badly beaten so our strategy is going to
be approaching the officials and let's
see whether they'll let us in mmm our
plan doesn't seem to be working too well
with these guys a bit further down the
road though we did meet a friendly
official okay so we have been allowed
inside the temple complex and if we go
along here you can see the hospital here
which is part of the complex and
provides the officials here say free
services for local people now if we come
around the corner here you'll get a
sense of the scale of this place we're
talking about a thousand acres it covers
and we understand there are about 40,000
devotees here at the moment now this
place has virtually everything you can
imagine a city we have as well as the
hospital there's a hotel there's a
resort complex there's a huge auditorium
area where the Guru holds seminars
sessions
services for his faithful performs he
plays guitar he plays music as well now
behind there's a meditation hit area
just to my left here and behind the
meditation area is a kind of Palace
complex which is the guru's home the
administrator who let us in described
this place as a city within a city and
we have just penetrated the first layer
of security
leaving the complex we discovered just
how much security the Indian authorities
have put in place
as well as the police there is a huge
army presence here the authorities have
ordered that the Guru's assets including
the temple complex be seized
but the devotees don't appear ready to
give it up without a fight
leaving a dangerous standoff here in
North India
